!Hierarch Kekropus: Yes! But be warned: Einhasad's enmity towards us had not diminished. She understands the implications of the power that we wield, a power that stems from our very origin. Because we were not created by the gods, we are not bound by the wheel of fate that governs their other creations. That is why she fears us... [Quest _068_SagaOfTheSoulHound 0-013.htm|"What do you mean that we're not bound by the wheel of fate?"]
